column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Varrick , how come your electro - thingy shut down the small mecha suits but not the big one ? "
#Text=Baatar Jr. says : " Because it 's powered with spirit vine energy .
#Text=" Asami says : " Dad ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I got him out of jail to help .
#Text=I figured we need all the geniuses we can get our hands on right now .
#Text=If the prison 's still standing after all this is over , we can throw him back in .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " I know what you all must think of me , but I love Republic City and I would do anything to save her .
#Text=" Korra says : " You think you know how to defeat this thing ?
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " You must act like an infection : break the skin and attack its vital organs , disconnect the heart and the brain and this beast can not live .
#Text=" Korra says : " But how are we supposed to get inside ?
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " Future Industries has plasma saws for cutting platinum .
#Text=If we had one on the mecha suit ... " Asami says : " But the saws are way too big .
#Text=We 'd never get the suits off the ground .
#Text=" Hiroshi says : " I think I can add an electrical element to the welding torch on your suit and convert it into a plasma saw .
#Text=Then we 'll just have to land on the giant and cut open a hole big enough for someone to get in .
#Text=" Asami says : " Like a metal mosquito .
#Text=" Varrick says : " You know what happens to mosquitoes that land on me ?
#Text=I squash 'em !
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll have to attack in a swarm to try to keep you guys safe in the hummingbird suits .
#Text=It looks like they 're our only hope .
#Text="
